summary: the major Incident Hospital (MIH) is a unique facility strictly reserved to provide immediate large-scale emergency care for victims of major incidents and major incidents. the organization was able to provide group-wise emergency care to military victims as well as civilian victims of major incidents and disasters, both national (260) and international (226).
